data.lyric:
[ti:All of Me]
[ar:John Legend]
[al:DARKNESS AND LIGHT (Asia Tour Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]All of Me - John Legend (约翰·传奇)
[00:04.40]Written by：John Stephens/Toby Gad
[00:08.81]What would I do without your smart mouth
[00:12.20]
[00:12.73]Drawing me in and you kicking me out
[00:15.75]
[00:16.27]You got my head spinning no kidding I can't pin you down
[00:24.03]What's going on in that beautiful mind
[00:27.24]
[00:27.85]I'm on your magical mystery ride
[00:31.11]
[00:31.73]And I'm so dizzy don't know what hit me but I'll be all right
[00:39.23]
[00:40.06]My head's under water but I'm breathing fine
[00:46.57]
[00:47.77]You're crazy and I'm out of my mind
[00:52.42]
[00:53.52]Cause all of me loves all of you
[00:59.68]
[01:00.24]Love your curves and all your edges
[01:03.26]
[01:04.21]All your perfect imperfections
[01:07.21]
[01:07.91]Give your all to me I'll give my all to you
[01:14.85]
[01:15.44]You're my end and my beginning
[01:18.56]
[01:19.43]Even when I lose I'm winning
[01:22.37]
[01:22.98]Cause I give you all of me
[01:28.27]
[01:30.49]And you give me all of you
[01:36.21]
[01:40.33]How many times do I have to tell you
[01:43.42]
[01:44.06]Even when you're crying you're beautiful too
[01:47.05]
[01:47.64]The world is beating you down I'm around
[01:53.43]Through every mood
[01:54.70]
[01:55.35]You're my downfall you're my muse
[01:59.03]My worst distraction my rhythm and blues
[02:02.79]I can't stop singing it's ringing in my head for you
[02:10.54]
[02:11.61]My head's under water but I'm breathing fine
[02:18.12]
[02:19.25]You're crazy and I'm out of my mind
[02:23.94]
[02:24.93]Cause all of me loves all of you
[02:31.04]
[02:31.64]Love your curves and all your edges
[02:34.77]
[02:35.61]All your perfect imperfections
[02:38.59]
[02:39.24]Give your all to me I'll give my all to you
[02:46.25]
[02:46.85]You're my end and my beginning
[02:50.07]
[02:50.58]Even when I lose I'm winning
[02:53.84]
[02:54.43]Cause I give you all of me
[02:59.89]
[03:02.01]And you give me all of you
[03:07.31]
[03:09.54]Give me all of you
[03:11.41]
[03:12.93]Cards on the table we're both showing hearts
[03:19.08]
[03:20.45]Risking it all though it's hard
[03:24.89]
[03:25.93]Cause all of me loves all of you
[03:31.93]
[03:32.53]Love your curves and all your edges
[03:35.82]
[03:36.54]All your perfect imperfections
[03:39.49]
[03:40.39]Give your all to me I'll give my all to you
[03:47.14]
[03:47.80]You're my end and my beginning
[03:50.87]
[03:51.79]Even when I lose I'm winning
[03:54.65]
[03:55.31]Cause I give you all of me
[04:00.61]
[04:02.94]And you give me all of you
[04:08.20]
[04:10.78]I give you all of me
[04:15.95]
[04:18.22]And you give me all of you
data.trans:
[ti:All of Me]
[ar:John Legend]
[al:DARKNESS AND LIGHT (Asia Tour Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.40]//
[00:08.81]没有你的甜言蜜语 我该如何是好
[00:12.20]
[00:12.73]你时而热情似火 时而冷若冰霜
[00:15.75]
[00:16.27]让我神魂颠倒 又无力抓住
[00:24.03]你那可爱的脑袋里到底在想些什么
[00:27.24]
[00:27.85]你的世界神秘莫测 让我不禁追随
[00:31.11]
[00:31.73]不知被什么击中 我的头脑一阵晕眩 怅然若失
[00:39.23]
[00:40.06]仿佛坠入水中 却依然呼吸自如
[00:46.57]
[00:47.77]你是如此狂野 让我失去理智
[00:52.42]
[00:53.52]因为我的全部爱上你的一切
[00:59.68]
[01:00.24]你曼妙的身姿 玲珑的曲线
[01:03.26]
[01:04.21]还有你不完美的完美
[01:07.21]
[01:07.91]把你的全部都交给我吧 我会倾我所有
[01:14.85]
[01:15.44]你是旅程的终点 亦是起点
[01:18.56]
[01:19.43]即使输了一切 有你在身边已是满足
[01:22.37]
[01:22.98]因为我把我的全部都交给你
[01:28.27]
[01:30.49]你也让我得到整个世界
[01:36.21]
[01:40.33]多少次忍不住告诉你
[01:43.42]
[01:44.06]即使你哭泣 你依然是最美的
[01:47.05]
[01:47.64]哪怕世界让你疲惫不堪  
[01:53.43]我永远不离不弃
[01:54.70]
[01:55.35]你是奔流向我的瀑布 予我灵感的缪斯
[01:59.03]你是悦耳的布鲁斯 拨乱我的心弦
[02:02.79]旋律萦绕在心头 我无法停止歌唱 只因你的灵魂在呼唤
[02:10.54]
[02:11.61]仿佛坠入水中 却依然呼吸自如
[02:18.12]
[02:19.25]你是如此狂野 让我失去理智
[02:23.94]
[02:24.93]因为我的全部爱上你的一切
[02:31.04]
[02:31.64]你曼妙的身姿 玲珑的曲线
[02:34.77]
[02:35.61]还有你不完美的完美
[02:38.59]
[02:39.24]把你的全部都交给我吧 我会倾我所有
[02:46.25]
[02:46.85]你是我人生之旅的终点 亦是起点
[02:50.07]
[02:50.58]即使输了一切 有你在身边已是满足
[02:53.84]
[02:54.43]因为我把我的全部都交给你
[02:59.89]
[03:02.01]你也给我你的全部
[03:07.31]
[03:09.54]让我得到整个世界
[03:11.41]
[03:12.93]我们是如此心心相连 我们向彼此吐露心声
[03:19.08]
[03:20.45]来吧 旅程艰险 但我们勇敢无畏
[03:24.89]
[03:25.93]因为我的全部爱上你的一切
[03:31.93]
[03:32.53]你曼妙的身姿 玲珑的曲线
[03:35.82]
[03:36.54]还有你不完美的完美
[03:39.49]
[03:40.39]把你的全部都交给我吧 我会倾我所有
[03:47.14]
[03:47.80]你是我人生之旅的终点 亦是起点
[03:50.87]
[03:51.79]即使输了一切 有你在身边已是满足
[03:54.65]
[03:55.31]因为我把我的全部都交给你
[04:00.61]
[04:02.94]你也给我你的全部
[04:08.20]
[04:10.78]我把我的全部都交给你 毫无保留
[04:15.95]
[04:18.22]你让我得到整个世界
